00066 void cleanup(int ret)
00067 {
00068   // stop all mpi clients
00069 
00070 #ifdef MPI
00071   int task=TASKFIN;
00072   BroadcastTask(&task);
00073 
00074   MPI_Finalize();
00075 #endif
00076  
00077   // terminate program with return code
00078   exit(ret);
00079 }

00346     Const[nconst] = ConstraintQ2;
00347     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(24*M_PI/5)*constbval;
00348     nconst++;
00349   }
00350   if (constgamma) {
00351     if (!constbeta) {
00352       fprintf(stderr, "gamma constraint only in combination with beta constraint\n");
00353       exit(-1);
00354     }
00355     Const[nconst] = ConstraintDetQ;
00356     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(4*M_PI/5)*constbval*cbrt(2*cos(3*constgval*M_PI/180));
00357     nconst++;
00358   }

00360   char* projpar = argv[optind];

00364   // set up angular integration

00366   initAngintegration(&AngPar, projpar);

00368   // read interaction from file
00369   Interaction Int;
00370   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00371     cleanup(-1);
00372   Int.cm = cm;

00374   Parameterization P;
00375   Para qinitial;
00376   if (readParafromFile(&P, &qinitial, parafile))

00379   SlaterDet Q;
00380   SlaterDetAux X;
00381 
00382   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00383 
00384   if (!par)
00385     par = (Q.A % 2) ? -1 : +1;
00386   if (!selk)
00387     k = (Q.A % 2);
00388

00390   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);

00400   double einitial, eintr;

00402   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);

00414                            &eintr, &einitial);
00415 #endif

00417   for (int i=0; i<nconst; i++)

00426 
00427   // shaking the parameters ?

00430   }
00431 
00432   // in FMD parameterization move SlaterDet to origin in phase space
00433   // if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD")) {

00443   double e;
00444   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);

00457 
00458   // no improvement ? then write initial parameters
00459   if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00460     P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00461 
00462   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00463 
00464   // orient SlaterDet
00465   // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet

00467   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00468   // moveboostSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00469 
00470   if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00471     SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);

00478   backup(parafile);

00480   fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);

00482   FILE* outfp;

00488   fprintinfo(outfp);

00497   fprintf(outfp, "# projected energy: %8.3f\n", e*hbc);
00498 
00499   fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);

00501   fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");

00503   P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
